a novel graph-based approach to the shape decomposition problem is addressed. The shape is appropriately transformed into an visibility graph enriched with local neighborhood information. the conclusion of an argument involves uncertainty. We argue that uncertainty may be taken to characterize inferences, their conclusions or their premises or all three. in static images, object detection in videos is more challenging due to degraded image qualities.
